q: ' X Factor'- will be joining the panel on the new programme after they praised her "chemistry" with show chief Simon Cowell . Despite rocker David Archuleta Cook's surge in recent weeks, the judges were uncharacteristically united in proclaiming early fan favorite teen David Archuleta had outperformed his rival. You came out here tonight to win, and what we have witnessed is a knockout, said prickly judge Simon Cowell . studio audience on "Late Show With David Letterman " was a surreal experience. "Playing on TV for the first time when you're in your 20s, it's just bizarre," recalled Brian Bell . There's a lot of pressure when you're young. Now, he said, performing in front of 100 people- or 15,000- feels "so natural." Donald Rumsfeld , who served as President Bush 's defense chief for six years after holding the the same job under president Gerald Ford in the 1970s, acknowledged that "in a war, many things cost lives."
